info.name: Deep Dark Purple Twitter
info.description:
A Dark & Purple theme for Twitter.

Giving you a stylish dark and purple theme, with a tonne of twitter clutter removed.
info.additionalInfo:
v 0.46 (2018.03.28) >>

•  Hotfix for issue where the new threads applies to your own threads.  This was not present on the 13th during testing.
•  Removes a bit of redundancy no longer needed in Stylish 3.0+
•  Fixes "You have blocked $user" showing up as dark grey
•  Fixes a 'white circle' showing up behind verified checkmarks
•  This update finally includes details from the hotfix at the end of 2017!

Previous notes can be found at:  http://www.oiseucalypt.com/ois/pmwiki.php/Styles/DDPT
